Morton ... and by additional contributions from L. Agassiz, W. Usher, and ... H. S. Patterson. ... By J. C. Nott and G. R. Gliddon" Author: NOTT, Josiah Clark. Contributor: GLIDDON, George Robins. Page: 345 Place of Publishing: London, Philadelphia [printed] Date of Publishing: 1854 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002678173 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
